name: race-course-visualizer
description: Expert system for interpreting sailing race course diagrams and text descriptions, converting them into 3D visualizations. Understands geometric course patterns (windward/leeward, triangle, trapezoid), mark configurations, gate logic, and generates MapLibre GeoJSON for interactive course rendering.
capabilities: Parse course sequence from text (e.g., 'Start – A – C – A – C – Finish')
Interpret geometric course diagrams from images
Recognize standardized course families (RHKYC, US Sailing, World Sailing)
Extract mark positions, types, and rounding rules
Apply venue-specific wind orientation to courses
Provide tactical recommendations based on course geometry
author: RegattaFlow
